Texts and phone calls are sent out in cases of emergency.
Where's Pete on Wednesdays is fun. The first person to submit the correct location wins a prize.
I have not eaten on campus.
I do not live on campus.
If taking math or accounting classes, take them on campus.

Oklahoma State University at Oklahoma City is a great college. The online accounting program is tough, but useful. I have recommended this school to others who wish to take an online only program for their degrees.

textAfterTable: The professors and the textbooks are very informative and presented in a way that is simple to understand. Login to rate or flag the reviews Samantha from Guthrie, OK 10/03/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 31 Categories Comments Campus Safety I feel very secure on campus, we have a training facility for paramedics and security, and they will jump in to do what needs done. Clubs and Activities Way to many to list! And they are awesome. Great for these types of students Great for all students. I love the diversity of OSU, they accept you for who you are and that is that!!! Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus The Hub has great food and a comfortable atmosphere to study or just hang
